trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref>的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>中的项时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>创建控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is data bound to a source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>中的项时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件被数据绑定到源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataListItemEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DataListItemEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
